trans-unit.source: Manage servers and usage data
trans-unit.target: Manage servers and usage data

trans-unit.source: Learn about how much data is sent to the Operational Insights service from your servers
trans-unit.target: Learn about how much data is sent to the Operational Insights service from your servers

trans-unit.source: Manage servers and usage data
trans-unit.target: Manage servers and usage data

trans-unit.source: Operational Insights collects data and sends it to the Operational Insights service periodically.
trans-unit.target: Operational Insights collects data and sends it to the Operational Insights service periodically.

trans-unit.source: You can use the **Usage** dashboard to view how much data is being sent to the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: You can use the **Usage** dashboard to view how much data is being sent to the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: The **Usage** dashboard also shows you how much data is being sent daily by solutions and how often your management groups are sending data.
trans-unit.target: The **Usage** dashboard also shows you how much data is being sent daily by solutions and how often your management groups are sending data.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have a free account, you're limited to sending 500 MB of data to the Operational Insights service daily.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If you have a free account, you're limited to sending 500 MB of data to the Operational Insights service daily.

trans-unit.source: If you reach the daily limit, data analyzing will stop and resume at the start of the next day.
trans-unit.target: If you reach the daily limit, data analyzing will stop and resume at the start of the next day.

trans-unit.source: You can view your usage by using the **Servers and Usage** tile on the **Overview** dashboard in Operational Insights.
trans-unit.target: You can view your usage by using the **Servers and Usage** tile on the **Overview** dashboard in Operational Insights.

trans-unit.source: image of Servers and Usage tile
trans-unit.target: image of Servers and Usage tile

trans-unit.source: If you have exceeded your daily usage limit, or if you are near your limit, you can optionally remove a solution to reduce the amount of data that you send to the Operational Insights service.
trans-unit.target: If you have exceeded your daily usage limit, or if you are near your limit, you can optionally remove a solution to reduce the amount of data that you send to the Operational Insights service.

trans-unit.source: For more information about removing solutions, see [Use the Solutions Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about removing solutions, see [Use the Solutions Gallery to add or remove solutions](operational-insights-setup-workspace.md).

trans-unit.source: If an Operations Manager management group is having problems sending data to the Operational Insights service, you can troubleshoot the issue, or you can remove the group from Operational Insights, if needed.
trans-unit.target: If an Operations Manager management group is having problems sending data to the Operational Insights service, you can troubleshoot the issue, or you can remove the group from Operational Insights, if needed.

trans-unit.source: image of Usage dashboard
trans-unit.target: image of Usage dashboard

trans-unit.source: The **Usage** dashboard displays the following information:
trans-unit.target: The **Usage** dashboard displays the following information:

trans-unit.source: Average usage per day
trans-unit.target: Average usage per day

trans-unit.source: Data usage for each solution for today
trans-unit.target: Data usage for each solution for today

trans-unit.source: How often the servers in each management group are sending data to the Operational Insights service
trans-unit.target: How often the servers in each management group are sending data to the Operational Insights service

trans-unit.source: To work with usage data
trans-unit.target: To work with usage data

trans-unit.source: On the **Overview** page, click the **Servers and Usage** tile.
trans-unit.target: On the **Overview** page, click the **Servers and Usage** tile.

trans-unit.source: On the **Usage** dashboard, view the usage categories that show areas you’re concerned about.
trans-unit.target: On the **Usage** dashboard, view the usage categories that show areas you’re concerned about.

trans-unit.source: If there is data about a solution that is unnecessarily using a lot of the allotted quota, you might consider removing that solution.
trans-unit.target: If there is data about a solution that is unnecessarily using a lot of the allotted quota, you might consider removing that solution.

trans-unit.source: To troubleshoot or remove management groups
trans-unit.target: To troubleshoot or remove management groups

trans-unit.source: On the **Overview** page, click the **Servers and Usage** tile.
trans-unit.target: On the **Overview** page, click the **Servers and Usage** tile.

trans-unit.source: On the **Usage** dashboard, view information about the management groups that aren’t sending data.
trans-unit.target: On the **Usage** dashboard, view information about the management groups that aren’t sending data.

trans-unit.source: If there’s a management group that isn’t sending data, you can click **Troubleshoot** to get detailed troubleshooting information.
trans-unit.target: If there’s a management group that isn’t sending data, you can click **Troubleshoot** to get detailed troubleshooting information.

trans-unit.source: If you no longer want to keep a management group and all the agents that report to it, click **Remove**.
trans-unit.target: If you no longer want to keep a management group and all the agents that report to it, click **Remove**.
